description: BTIDES HCI information data types that don't fit elsewhere

HCI_Remote_Name_Request_Complete.description: Data from an HCI "Remote Name Request Complete" event.
HCI_Remote_Name_Request_Complete.$comment: This is data which doesn't fit the exact definition of the corresponding LMP_NAME_REQ/RSP packets, because the Controller reassembles any fragments. So this needs to go in this new file.
HCI_Remote_Name_Request_Complete.$comment2: Even though there's a bdaddr defined in this HCI event type, I removed it from here since it would be pointless to include when it's up at the top level. (And it would just lead to confusion for users.)

event_code_str.description: This optional field is just for if you don't care about json file size and you want more human-readable JSON output.

event_code.description: This should always be 7. This is required to differentiate from other data types in an array.

status.description: 0 for success, other values for failure.

remote_name.description: The full device name, without fragmentation.
